mobs.long_desc: An ugly swamp beast slithers by your feet causing your body to shiver.
mobs.desc: As you look at this hideous beast, you notice that it is green-black in color and it's very slimy.  The beast stops and look right in your eyes and you get a picture of pure terror in your mind.  What is this beast?

mobs.long_desc: A glowing lizard, bright pink in color, stares at you.
mobs.desc: The glowing lizard looks to have very tough skin.  Its skin is shiny and resembles metal.  The lizard is fairly large; about 10 feet in length, and has a pretty powerful looking tail and set of teeth.  It may be a lizard but it looks like it could inflict some serious damage.

mobs.long_desc: A deranged bile lurches through the undergrowth.
mobs.desc: Dressed in woven swamp grass, this bile is difficult to see from a distance. It lurches forward, its pupils dilated. It appears quite deranged, and more than a little angry!

rooms.name: The Northern Swamps
rooms.description: You are standing in the Northern Swamps, knee-deep in muck.

East.description: The swamp continues to the east.

West.description: The swamp continues to the west.

rooms.name: The Northern Swamps
rooms.description: You are standing in the Northern Swamps, knee-deep in muck.

North.description: The swamp continues to the north.

West.description: The swamp continues to the west.

rooms.name: The Northern Swamps
rooms.description: You are standing in the Northern Swamps, knee-deep in muck.

North.description: The swamp continues to the north.

South.description: The swamp continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Northern Swamps
rooms.description: You are standing in the Northern Swamps, knee-deep in muck.

East.description: The swamp continues to the east.

South.description: The swamp continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Northern Swamps
rooms.description: You are standing in the Northern Swamps, knee-deep in muck.

South.description: The swamp continues to the south.

West.description: The swamp continues to the west.

rooms.name: The Northern Swamps
rooms.description: You are standing in the Northern Swamps, knee-deep in muck.

North.description: The swamp continues to the north.

East.description: The swamp continues to the east, you notice the swamp getting shallower.

rooms.name: The Northern Swamps
rooms.description: The swamp is considerably more shallow here, and a small dirt road starts to appear to the east.

East.description: To the east you can see a small dirt road appear.

West.description: To the west the swamp gets deeper.

rooms.name: A Small Dirt Road
rooms.description: You are now on a small dirt road.  This path suggests that not too many people travel it, but it is worn down enough so that travel is much easier now. You notice that there is abundant vegetation on both sides of the path.  Wild flowers are blooming and you notice a sweet smell permeating the surrounding air.

East.description: The small dirt road appears to continue to the east.

West.description: You notice the swamp is very shallow to the west and the road that you are on originates from there.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Small Dirt Road
rooms.description: This small dirt road now comes to a sharp turn and curves off to the north. The vegetation is getting thinner as the road widens.  There has been more activity on this part of the road, as the dirt is considerably more packed.

North.description: The path gets wider and more worn down to the north.

West.description: The dirt road gets smaller to tthe east.

rooms.name: A Small Dirt Road
rooms.description: The dirt road is getting wide enough now for a group of three to walk comfortably side by side.  You notice many small woodland trails converging into this road.  You imagine you could travel to many places, but the trails are very small, and right now you are more interested as to where this road leads.

North.description: The path continues on to the north.

South.description: You can see the road getting narrower to the south.

rooms.name: The Strange Road
rooms.description: You notice that the road has evened out.  There is now enough room for four people to walk side by side, and the road is well traveled.  There are signs that people have recently been by, as there is some cloth, wood and pieces of metal lying about.  You also notice that the vegetation has been changing as you continue along the path.  The plants look taller, and some of the plants seem to be watching you.  A chill runs down your spine and you feel a tingling sensation fill your body for a brief moment.

North.description: The path continues to the north.

South.description: The road continues on to the south.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Small Dirt Road
rooms.description: You notice that the road has evened out.  There is now enough room for four people to walk side by side, and the road is well traveled.  There are signs that people have recently been by, as there is some cloth, wood and pieces of metal lying about.  You also notice that the vegetation has been changing as you continue along the path.  The plants look taller, and some of the plants seem to be watching you.  A chill runs down your spine and you feel a tingling sensation fill your body for a brief moment.

East.description: To the east you can see a multi-colored road.

South.description: The road continues on to the south.

rooms.name: The Beginning of the Multi-Coloured Road
rooms.description: You can see that there are different colored pebbles on the ground here. There are deep greens, blues, reds and some yellow stones littering the road. The stones are slowly changing colors, cycling through the entire spectrum of the rainbow, and the effect is wondrous!  You also notice that the plants continue to grow larger and more threatening as you continue on down the path.

East.description: The multi-colored road continues to the east.

West.description: You can see a dirt road to the west.

rooms.name: The Multi-Coloured Road
rooms.description: This road is very colorful, much more than the beginning.  The pebbles entirely cover the road, and their constant color changing is entrancing. There is also heat being emanated from the rocks; the heat gently warms your body, making you feel relaxed as you continue your journey.  The plants on the side of the road now seem like they are moving and you can see large thorns and what seem to be teeth in the plants.

East.description: The multi-colored road continues to the east.

West.description: The multi-colored road continues to the west.

rooms.name: The Multi-Coloured Road
rooms.description: This road continues on to the east and west.  You notice that there is not one single pebble that is not changing color.  The road almost seems alive. As you continue down the path you notice that there is now small animals running around and darting in and out of the road and scurrying all around. The animals are small and quick; you can't see them for long enough to identify what they actually are.

West.description: The multi-colored road continues to the west.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Multi-Coloured Road
rooms.description: As this road continues you can't help but notice how strange the wildlife and vegetation is.  You have never in all of your travels seen anything quite like it before.  The plants are strange and wonderful, while the wildlife is also very different.  You could almost swear that there is magic in the air, but there is no discernable source that you can see.  The air here feels almost charged with energy and you can feel that energy flowing through your body. The road ahead turns to the north.

North.description: The road ahead is especially beautiful.

rooms.name: A Beautiful Camp Area on the Multi-Coloured Road
rooms.description: This part of the road is wider than others.  You can see a small camp area off to the right.  There is a stream not too far off in the distance, and brisk cool water flows through it.  There is also a well for replenishing your water supply here.  However as you lift the bucket from deep within the earth you notice that the water is boiling hot and it is purple!  What is the cause for this?  Maybe the magic that you have felt throughout your trip has caused the water supply to become altered, maybe its a natural occurrence; either way that water isn't going into your body.  The road continues on to the north where the road seems to change from it's beautiful but strange multi-colored pebbles back to a normal road.

North.description: Ahead you can see the road changes slightly.

South.description: This road continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Beginning of the Road to Nordus
rooms.description: As you look around you can see that the road is changing rapidly.  Just a short while ago the road was virtually alive, and this road is the complete opposite.  The plain dirt road that is common in most parts of this great land is also here.  What is causing these frequent changes in your surroundings? Maybe the answer lies ahead.  There is a sign firmly planted into the ground here.

North.description: You can see the road change direction to the north.

South.description: This road continues to the south.

extras.text: Go back while you still have a chance! There is no hope for those that continue to proceed along this path.

rooms.name: A Turn in the Road to Nordus
rooms.description: This road is very plain.  Nothing adorns it at all.  The plants are all wilted and dying.  You can't hear any wildlife moving and the path is very monotonous.  The road is making you depressed and you just want to continue with your journey and forget this drab road.

South.description: This road continues to the south.

West.description: You can see the road continue to the west.

rooms.name: The Road to Nordus
rooms.description: This plain road is very depressing.  It is very quiet and while it gives you time to think.  The only things that you can think of are the most depressing things that have happened to you.  Not one good thought has crossed your mind ever since you have started upon this road.

East.description: The road continues to the east.

West.description: You can see the road continue to the west.

rooms.name: A Bend in the Road to Nordus
rooms.description: As you walk down this road you wish that the road would just end.  You can almost not stand it anymore.  Sadness fills your heart and you can't even think of one good thought.  Everything you look at reminds you of something else depressing.  You hope that this road will end soon.  The road ahead seems to be changing, but you just figure it's an illusion as nothing good could ever happen.

North.description: You can see the path ahead turns into a gravel path.

East.description: The road continues to the east.

rooms.name: The Path to the Gate
rooms.description: This path is all gravel.  The road is considerably less wide than before. You notice that you can finally think of happy things and the depression that overwhelmed you previously has lifted.  You notice that there is a gate in the distance.  Maybe you can finally find some answers.

North.description: The gravel path continues to the north.

South.description: You can see a dirt road to the south.

rooms.name: The Path to the Gate
rooms.description: This part of the path is pleasant.  There is lush green vegetation all around and you stop to take a drink from the stream that is trickling alongside.  The gate that you saw previously is getting more pronounced now and you are almost able to make out detail.  This part of the path is particularly pleasant.  Maybe you could stop and take a rest here.  Seems safe enough.

North.description: The path continues to the north.

South.description: The path continues to the south.

rooms.name: The Path to the Gate
rooms.description: You can now see the gate with great detail.  It is not far now -- you can't wait to see what is up ahead.  You need to replenish some supplies and maybe find a bed to rest your weary body on for a night.  You hope that you can relax a bit and have some fun.  The path is very clean and tidy right here.  You notice that it's very worn down and there are signs of recent activity.

North.description: The Gate is to the North.

South.description: The path continues to the south.
